markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs=""
>
[Crushing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1298)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a bludgeoning weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Weapons with this rune empower your strength, and attacks with these weapons leave your foe staggered. When you critically hit a target with this weapon, your target becomes [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) until the end of your next turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Crushing
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42</row>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Crushing (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42</row>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your critical hits leave the target clumsy 2 and enfeebled 2 until the end of your next turn.
name: Crushing (Greater)
